title: Is Cengage chemistry good for JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to me CENGAGE is really good for jee advanced but only MATHS AND PHYSICS. In chemistry you don't have any standard book for jee advanced preparation. So in chemistry try to read any standard coaching institute study materials like FIITJEE, RESONANCE OR AAKASH… Specially RESONANCE….. Why cengage is not that good for chemistry…. It goes out of syllabus a lot.Contains errors specially in organic chemistryPhysical is good but better options are available and same for inorganic.NOW let's see what if we don't have coaching institutes study materials thenORGANIC CHEMISTRY : Read M S Chauhan organic chemistry for jee and also practice problems from question book of M S Chauhan (it is very time taking…) OR buy plancess online material for organic chemistry (better option )PHYSICAL CHEMISTRY : Read NCERT and RC MUKHERJEE and solve all questions from it.INORGANIC CHEMISTRY : Read NCERT carefully and refer coaching institutes study materials only if you have… because all good books will take a plenty of time and won't be good for you if your focus is exam….It was all my personal view may be wrong or right in some ways… Also instead of buying books buy all stydy material of any one class like allen or resonance etc. would be far better…

yes. because, cengage book contains all the chapters of jee advanced chemistry and it is the best book for quality question. this books contains all the topic with very easy theory and this book also contains past year jee questions so after buying this book you don’t have to buy any other book for past year question along with this book you will get a book of dpp which contains very good questions from the pattern of jee advanced level so this book is very good for jee. each chapters of this book contains 3 or 4 concept application exercise which clears your concept in a very good way. thank you for reading this.
